page.title: 05A SPORTS SHOP IN A-IN-M
page.content: Malcolm Brown a former P.E. teacher at Cansfield High School decided to set up a shop in the centre of Ashton. His shop took over K & B Sports. He started off a small scale business which grew larger and larger, importing foreign makes such as Sergio Tachini and Kangaroo gear which is very expensive and can be made specially for the buyer. Recently the Silk Cut Challenge Rugby Cup was held and Malcolm devoted his shop to Wigan who successfully defeated Hull 28-24. Malcolm's Wigan hats and scarves were completely sold out and also his Wigan shirts. Malcolm sells a wide range of both rugby and soccer balls .He also has a wide range of trainers like Adidas, Nike, Patrick, Hi-tech, and Puma.
